hero.title: Moldings for Columns and Capitals
hero.description: Decorative solutions for columns and capitals, combining sophistication and ease of installation.

categoryDescription.title: Isoart Moldings for Columns and Capitals bring charm and elegance to internal and external architectural projects.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart Moldings for Columns and Capitals are manufactured in high-density EPS with flexible coating, ideal for wrapping square pillars (up to 30x30 cm) or round ones (diameter up to 30 cm). With simple installation and customization, they offer sophisticated aesthetics, resistance to climate variations and low structural impact, perfect for residences and commercial buildings.

benefits.title: Structural lightness
benefits.description: Does not overload pillars, ideal for renovations.

benefits.title: Climate resistance
benefits.description: Withstands humidity and thermal variations without damage.

generalCharacteristics: Flexible coating with polymeric resin and mineral powders
Square or round models for pillars up to 30 cm

applications.title: Elegant solutions for columns and capitals in architectural projects
applications.description: Isoart Moldings for Columns and Capitals are ideal for covering pillars in internal and external environments, offering classic or modern aesthetics. With fast installation and resistance to weathering, they are perfect for residences, offices and commercial spaces.

tabDescriptions.Customizable aesthetics: Available in square or round models, the moldings allow finishes such as putties, textures and paintings, adapting to classic or modern projects.
tabDescriptions.Practical installation: Fixing with AC-3 mortar and wooden dowels for larger pieces ensures speed and precision, with joints reinforced by PU foam and mesh tape.
tabDescriptions.External durability: High-density EPS and flexible coating resist rain, sun and thermal variations, ideal for external columns without cracks.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability: 100% recyclable and CFC-free, Isoart moldings are environmentally responsible.
